select a.query_call_id, a.query_order_id, a.call_price_money, a.call_submit_deadline, a.prepayed_money_amount, a.vilation_money_amount,a.create_time, a.state,c.company_name,b.cas_no,b.user_id, b.image from t_query_order_callprice a, t_query_order b, t_certification c
a.state = 'HERE'or a.state = 'OTHER'
a.state = 'CANCEL'or a.state = 'BUYER_CANCEL'
a.state = #{status}
and a.user_id = #{userId} and b.user_id = c.user_id and a.query_order_id = b.query_order_id
and (b.cas_no like CONCAT('%', #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
order by a.query_call_id asc
, ${orderColumn} ${orderType}

select a.query_order_id, a.query_call_id, a.call_price_money, a.call_submit_deadline, a.prepayed_money_amount, a.vilation_money_amount, b.company_name, b.user_id, b.certificate_id, a.call_purity from t_query_order_callprice a, t_certification b where a.user_id = b.user_id and a.query_order_id = #{queryOrderId} and a.state = 'BIDDING'
and (b.company_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))

, ${orderColumn} ${orderType}
